title: Serena Williams
details:
1. Create a Serena Williams badge.
2. Have a mini tennis match in the living room.
3. Design your tennis outfit.
4. Set up a mini workout inspired by Serena's training.

title: Beyoncé
details:
1. Create a microphone using cardboard and foil and have a mini concert.
2. Put on a dress-up fashion show inspired by Beyoncé's iconic outfits.
3. Dance to kid-friendly versions of Beyoncé's songs in a mini dance party.
4. Make a simple craft crown to feel like royalty.
5. Create a 'Beyoncé Vision Board' with magazine cutouts and drawings.
6. Watch clips of Beyoncé's family-friendly performances together.
7. Pretend to be in a recording studio and 'record' your own song.
8. Play 'Single Ladies' freeze dance and stop when the music pauses.
9. Design your own music album cover with crayons and paper.
10. Have a snack break with lemonade and talk about what makes your child feel powerful and confident.
